类 AssistantSystem

java.lang.Object
AssistantSystem
public class AssistantSystem extends Object
Class AssistantSystem is the class that holds majory methods to deal with command line arguments and further commands.

    • inputGeneralMandatoryField

      private <T extends data.Data> void inputGeneralMandatoryField(T data, String type, String field, Scanner stdin)
      Set general mandatory data that shares the same pattern of error message for the target object.
      类型参数:
      T - generic class for Class Application or Class Job
      参数:
      data - the target object
      type - the class of the target object, either "application" or "job"
      field - the field of the target object to be set
      stdin - the Scanner object for further input
      另请参阅:
      • Application
      • Job
